resources.string: Tip: You can disable haptic vibrations from anywhere in the app by simply pressing the volume up and down buttons once!

string-array.name: loading_msg
string-array.item: Choosing Between The Blue and Red Pill
We\'re building the buildings as fast as we can
Warning: Don\'t set yourself on fire.
Did you try tapping in the bottom of settings…?
Thinking Of an Offer Which You Can\'t Refuse

resources.string: Explosive brick (breaks all bricks around it)
Movable brick (keeps moving from one side to another)
Psss… Just between you and me
Do you want to get the maximum score for free?
Do you want to reset the high score to zero?
This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.
Access to the camera is needed for detection
Access to the external storage is needed for saving
This application cannot run because it does not have the camera permission. The application will now exit.
Ocr dependencies cannot be downloaded due to low device storage
